client.description: Google Cloud BigQuery client instance (like new BigQuery({ projectId, keyFilename }))

datasetId.description: BigQuery dataset ID where events will be stored (like walker_events)

tableId.description: BigQuery table ID for event storage (like events)

location.description: Geographic location for the BigQuery dataset (like US)

bigquery.description: Additional BigQuery client configuration options (like { keyFilename: "path/to/key.json" })
